title: GitHub OAuth Authentication Success
description: Verify user can successfully authenticate using GitHub OAuth and access repositories.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Initiate GitHub OAuth login flow
Complete OAuth authentication with valid GitHub credentials
Confirm authentication is successful and user session is established
Verify repository list is fetched and displayed

title: GitHub OAuth Authentication Failure Handling
description: Verify the system handles GitHub OAuth authentication failures gracefully with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Initiate GitHub OAuth login flow
Simulate OAuth failure or user denial
Display clear error message related to authentication failure
Ensure user is not logged in and stays on login page

title: Repository Selection and Browsing
description: Verify user can select one or more repositories and browse repository files successfully.

steps.description: Log in via GitHub OAuth
Display list of user repositories (private and public)
Select a repository from the list
Browse repository file tree
Confirm selected repositories load correctly
Repository file tree is displayed and navigable without errors

title: AI Static Code Analysis and Identification of Uncovered Areas
description: Verify AI-powered analysis detects uncovered functions, classes, and endpoints correctly in selected repositories.

steps.description: Select repository with known coverage gaps
Trigger AI static code analysis for the repository
Check uncovered functions, classes, and endpoints are identified accurately
Analysis results are presented clearly to the user

title: Generated Test Case Preview and Customization
description: Verify user can preview and customize generated test cases including test framework and style options.

steps.description: After code analysis, auto-generate test cases for uncovered code
Display generated test cases in a code viewer
Provide options to customize testing framework and code style preferences
Modify customization options and regenerate preview
Generated test cases reflect customization and update accordingly

title: Generate Multiple Test Types
description: Verify that the system generates unit, integration, and API/functional tests covering all uncovered code areas.

steps.description: Select repository requiring multiple test types
Trigger test generation process
Generated tests include unit, integration, and functional tests
Test cases use appropriate frameworks (Jest, PyTest, JUnit, Mocha) based on language

title: Automated Pull Request Creation
description: Verify that user can create pull requests automatically with generated test branches and proper commit messages.

steps.description: Preview and confirm generated test cases are satisfactory
Initiate pull request creation
A new branch is created for the generated tests
Pull request is created with correct base and head branches
Pull request contains generated test files and descriptive commit messages

title: Dashboard Display and Functionality
description: Verify dashboard shows connected repositories, test coverage statistics before and after generation, and allows manual regeneration.

steps.description: Log into the application and navigate to dashboard
Dashboard displays all connected repositories with coverage metrics
Coverage statistics update after test generation
Trigger manual regeneration of tests from dashboard
Coverage stats refresh and user receives appropriate feedback

title: UI Theme Toggle Functionality
description: Verify the theme toggle control correctly switches between light and dark modes in the UI.

steps.description: Locate and activate the theme toggle control
UI switches to dark mode immediately
Toggle again to switch back to light mode
UI returns to light mode without visual defects or delays

title: Loading Indicators on Long Operations
description: Verify loading indicators display appropriately during long-running operations such as code scanning and test generation.

steps.description: Trigger repository analysis and test generation processes
Loading indicators are visible during processing
Loading indicators disappear promptly when process completes

title: Error Boundary and Toast Notification Display
description: Verify that error boundaries catch unexpected errors and toast notifications display user-friendly error messages.

steps.description: Simulate an unexpected error in a UI component
Error boundary catches and prevents app crash
User is shown a toast notification with a clear error message

title: Centralized API Error Handling and Retry Mechanism
description: Verify that API errors are handled centrally with retry logic and appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Simulate intermittent API failures during repository fetch or test generation
System automatically retries failed requests a limited number of times
If retries fail, user receives clear error notification via toast

title: Safe Handling of Private Repositories
description: Verify that private repositories are securely accessed only after successful OAuth authentication and that no unauthorized access occurs.

steps.description: Attempt accessing private repositories without authentication
Access is denied and user is prompted to authenticate
Authenticate via GitHub OAuth with proper scopes
Access to private repositories is granted securely

title: Validation of Generated Test Coverage Metrics
description: Verify that after test generation, coverage metrics accurately reflect the increase in test coverage.

steps.description: Obtain baseline coverage statistics prior to test generation
Generate tests for uncovered code
Fetch updated coverage metrics post generation
Coverage metrics show measurable improvement consistent with generated tests

title: Chatbot Assistance UI Functionality
description: Verify chatbot assistance component is accessible and provides helpful responses related to test generation and usage.

steps.description: Open chatbot assistance panel
Submit relevant queries about test generation or repository management
Chatbot responds with accurate, context-appropriate assistance
Close and reopen chatbot to verify stability
Chatbot component remains stable and responsive

title: Handling Invalid Repository Selection
description: Verify system handles invalid or inaccessible repository selections with appropriate user feedback and recovery options.

steps.description: Select a repository that user does not have access to or that has been deleted
User receives clear error notification
System prevents further operations on invalid repository
User can recover by selecting a valid repository

title: Test Generation Workflow Integration Testing
description: Verify the entire test generation workflow from file selection, AI analysis, test preview to pull request creation works smoothly integration-wise.

steps.description: Log in via GitHub OAuth
Select repository and browse files
Select specific files for test generation
Trigger AI static code analysis
Preview and customize generated tests
Create pull request for generated tests
Each step completes without errors and transitions correctly
Pull request contains correctly generated tests
